ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION1: We are a strong technical team passionate about AI since 2016, with experience in multinational companies and public sector projects, across banking, education, large-scale logistics, and telecommunications.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION2: We started this project in 2022, and since then, we've secured support from multiple investors and joined Techstars, one of the world's leading startup accelerators.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION3: We've delivered AI projects in a range of sectors, including a leading blockchain infrastructure provider and a prominent UK-based startup.
ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION4: More recently, we've focused on the industrial sector, helping manufacturers improve operations through intelligent automation and data-driven decision-making.

CONTACT_SECTION.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: We're not building AI for the sake of it. We're building AI that respects how people already get things done and helps them do it even better.

CARD1.TITLE: Smart Solutions
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: We automate repetitive tasks and enhance workflows, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.

CARD2.TITLE: Easy Growth
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Our solutions adapt to your business needs, enabling you to scale without complications.

CARD3.TITLE: Seamless Integration
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: We integrate AI into your operations effortlessly, ensuring efficiency without interruptions.

CARD1.TITLE: Let's book a call.
CARD1.SUBTITLE: Choose a time that works for you.

CARD2.TITLE: Not ready for a call? Send us a message.
CARD2.SUBTITLE: We'll respond to you shortly, typically within a few hours.

CONTACT_FORM_INPUTS.MESSAGEPLACEHOLDER: How can we help? Fell free to share any details.

WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.TITLE: What we stand for
WHAT_WE_DO_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We deliver tailored AI solutions that fit your business.
Our team analyzes your workflow and context to design personalized tools, enhancing operations without disruption.

Here are some examples of what we can achieve:

CARD1.TITLE:
Shared knowledge.
Smarter decisions.
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: No more relying on who remembers what.

CARD2.TITLE: Act before the opportunity slips away.
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: Stop wasting time on manual sales reports.

CARD4.TITLE:
Fast diagnostics.
Even remotely.
CARD4.DESCRIPTION: Take the guesswork out of maintenance.

CARD5.TITLE:
Operational data.
Instantly readable.
CARD5.DESCRIPTION: See what's really happening. In real time.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Stop solving what's already been solved
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: The answer might already exist inside your organization.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Important know-how often disappears with staff changes or shift rotations.

Without access to past fixes or test results, mistakes get repeated, and time and materials are wasted solving problems that already had a solution.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Still asking around for answers?
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Critical knowledge shouldn't depend on who's around.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Crucial answers are hidden in files, emails, or someone's memory. 

As teams search or wait for context, progress slows when they could be tackling whatâ€™s next.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Expert Knowledge
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: The Right Knowledge, Always at Hand.
ITEMS_PILLS: Capture and share the expertise of your top team members.
Help new employees learn faster and ensure that essential knowledge remains accessible and relevant over time, regardless of who is on the team.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Your sales team can only go so far
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Sales teams lose time every week gathering data instead of acting on it.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Finding new clients and recognizing product trends still rely on manual, time-consuming processes.

With limited tools and small teams, the pace is slow, the reach is limited, and valuable opportunities are left behind.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: You can't act on what you can't see
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Sales teams miss opportunities because they lack real visibility.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Key signals such as declining orders, inactive clients, or shifting demand are often hidden in disconnected tools or neglected in outdated reports.

Without a clear view, it's easy to miss the right moment to act.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Sales Optimization
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Close More Deals, Faster.
ITEMS_PILLS: Stay informed and never miss an opportunity.
Get alerts when it's the right time to reach out to inactive clients.
And let the assistant find new leads for you, so you focus on closing, not chasing.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Quoting shouldn't take this long
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Elaborating a proposal shouldn't feel like starting from scratch every time.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Searching for past quotes, comparing prices across markets, and checking technical variations, it's all done manually. 

Teams waste hours compiling information that should be instantaneous, preventing them from responding quickly and winning business.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Quoting without knowing what you can deliver?
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Without visibility, you risk delays and losing credibility.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Many proposals are made without knowing if there's enough stock or time to deliver.

Without visibility, it's harder to give accurate deadlines or spot which orders could wait so you can prioritize urgent ones.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Budget Planning
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Decide Faster, Plan Better, Deliver with Confidence.
ITEMS_PILLS: Helps you create clearer budgets and plan more effectively.
Simulate scenarios, view real-time data, manage stock levels, and make sure nothing goes wrong with deliveries - all in minutes, not days.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: It's not just the failure, it's how fast you respond
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Has it happened before? Find out in seconds.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
When a machine fails, acting quickly is key.

However, without access to similar past cases, it takes longer to understand the issue, especially if the expert is unavailable or the client is located far away.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Fix it before it breaks
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Stop guessing, start preventing.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
Identify issues long before they become failures.

Get smart alerts, spot patterns, and plan maintenance when it's most convenient, not when it's too late.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for More Efficient Maintenance
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Less Downtime. More Control.
ITEMS_PILLS: Get alerts about potential failures and see how similar issues were resolved in the past.
Support your team in preventing breakdowns and reducing costs with more efficient maintenance.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Drowning in data, starving for insights
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Too much info, not enough clarity.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
You've got dashboards, reports, and spreadsheets.
But when you need quick answers, you're stuck digging.

Complex questions take too long to solve, or worse, go unanswered.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: Decisions delayed, momentum lost
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: No time to wait for another report.
INNER_CARDS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT:
You have a hunch, but not the data to back it up.
Waiting on analysts slows everything down.

By the time you get the report, the moment's already passed.

INNER_CARDS.TITLE: AI Assistant for Insights with Dynamic Charts
INNER_CARDS.SUBTITLE: Understand what's happening, without wasting time.
ITEMS_PILLS: Turn simple questions into clear, visual answers, even when the data is complex or extensive.
Whether in production, quality, maintenance, or executive management, quickly analyze large volumes of information, identify patterns, and make informed decisions.
All in seconds, without relying on lengthy reports or technical analysis.

FOOTER.SLOGAN_SUBTITLE: Stay in touch with LYSIA Labs.
